    • Uses of FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig in de.cxp.ocs.config

      Methods in de.cxp.ocs.config that return FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setExcludeFromFacetLimit​(boolean excludeFromFacetLimit)
      If set to true, this facet will always be shown and not removed because of facet limit.
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setLabel​(String label)
      Label of that facet
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setMetaData​(Map<String,​Object> metaData)
      Optional map that is returned with that facet.
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setMultiSelect​(boolean isMultiSelect)
      Set to true if it should be possible to select several different values of the same facet.
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setOptimalValueCount​(int optimalValueCount)
      Primary used for numeric facets to build according number of value ranges.
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setOrder​(byte order)
      Optional index, to put the facets in a consistent order.
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setShowUnselectedOptions​(boolean showUnselectedOptions)
      Set to true if all options should be shown after filtering on one of the options of the same facet.
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setSourceField​(String sourceField)
      Required: Set name of data field that is configured with these config.
      FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig.setType​(String type)
      Optional type that relates to the available FacetCreators.
      Method parameters in de.cxp.ocs.config with type arguments of type FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      FacetConfiguration FacetConfiguration.setFacets​(@NonNull List<FacetConfiguration.FacetConfig> facets)
      A list of fine grained facet configurations.
